column4: Can anyone tell me why I cant install ubuntu on a desktop that uses a DVI converter?  I can get the install going but the video cuts off
idk I cant remove the converter because I need the converter to see video...
my vid card is dvi only and my monitor is vga
At start or install press F6 and remove Quiet and Splash from the command line. If it still fails repeat and add noapic acpi=off before the --
